meanings.sent1: Her misapprehensions about the situation led to confusion.
meanings.sent2: Many misapprehensions can be cleared up with proper communication.
meanings.sent3: His misapprehensions about the magic show made him think the rabbit was real.
meanings.sent4: The misapprehensions in her mind were like fog obscuring the truth.
meanings.sent5: The misapprehensions in the story made it more interesting to read.

meanings.definition: Failure to understand or interpret correctly.
meanings.sent1: The misapprehensions in his report caused misunderstandings.
meanings.sent2: Clear communication can help avoid misapprehensions in the workplace.
meanings.sent3: The misapprehensions in the comedy sketch made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her misapprehensions were like a puzzle missing a crucial piece.
meanings.sent5: The misapprehensions in the instructions led to many mistakes.
